types.html:
sahraoui (feminine sahraouie, masculine plural sahraouis, feminine plural sahraouies)

  1. Western Saharan, Sahrawi
    • 2015 October 12, “Oum réveille âme des dunes”, in Le Monde‎[1]:
      Pour moi le peuple sahraoui vivant au Maroc est marocain.
      As far as I'm concerned, Sahrawi people living in Morocco are Moroccan.

Related terms

[edit]
